abstract: Seven stories from Indigenous leaders about their upbringing and connection to Fitzroy.
description: Seven Indigenous leaders in the community tell of growing up in Fitzroy. From disperate backgrounds, they have all become heavily involved with the activism and community spirit of Fitzroy in Melbourne, to grow into inspirational leaders for generations to come. Here they share their experiences and passions, as well as the families and communities they love.
